testcase.name: click on both checkboxes
testcase.system-out: * def checkBox1 = "#checkboxes > input[type=checkbox]:nth-child(1)" ....... passed * def checkBox2 = "#checkboxes > input[type=checkbox]:nth-child(3)" ....... passed Given driver host + '/checkboxes' ......................................... passed When waitForEnabled(checkBox1).click() .................................... passed And waitForEnabled(checkBox2).click() ..................................... passed Then match attribute(checkBox1, 'checked') != null ........................ passed And match attribute(checkBox2, 'checked') == null ......................... passed
